page.name: System
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet.  A dagger that was crafted to represent the totality of the SekDuat regime...but it seems to be out of fashion now.

properties.name: System
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet.  A dagger that was crafted to represent the totality of the SekDuat regime...but it seems to be out of fashion now.

page.name: Death From Below
page.description: The rescued rebellion members have told Zhoom the tales of The Dunelord which were whispered by Sek-Duat's army. This ancient and powerful monster can only be stopped by a DragonLord!

properties.name: Death From Below
properties.description: The rescued rebellion members have told Zhoom the tales of The Dunelord which were whispered by Sek-Duat's army. This ancient and powerful monster can only be stopped by a DragonLord!
properties.complete: You and your dragon have defeated the ancient Dunelord and saved the rest of the people of The Sandsea! Sek-Duat's power is greatly diminished but he's still a great threat to the rebels.
